Applicants must meet the following requirement to be considered: Federal law requires that any Department of Labor position funded by a Consolidated Veteran Services grant must be filled by a veteran who meets one of the criteria below. 2. A) Served on active duty (Title 10 orders of deployment for Guard members) for a period of more than 180 days and was discharged with other than a dishonorable discharge; or
